headline: Microchip Technology, MACOM, NXP Semiconductors, Sensata Technologies, and Skyworks Solutions Shares Are Falling, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the morning session after the U.S. jobs report for July came in significantly weaker than expected while new widespread import tariffs were announced, sparking fears of a potential economic slowdown.

headline: Tariffs and Economic Jitters Hammer Stocks

headline: Next-Gen Compact Computer-on-Modules Empower Intelligent Edge Applications Powered by NXP i.MX 95
summary: NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NASDAQ: NXPI) has unveiled the i.MX 95 series, the latest addition to its powerful i.MX 9 series of application processors. The i.MX 95 integrates high-performance computing, immersive 3D graphics with Arm Mali™, a groundbreaking NXP machine learning accelerator, and ultra-fast data throughput. This robust feature set is built to support the growing demands of next-generation applications in automotive, industrial automation, networking, connectivity, and Human-Machine I
